医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
路易斯维尔大学的科学家致力于消灭鼠疫耶尔森氏菌（黑死病细菌）当身体遇到细菌、病毒或有害物质时，其先天免疫细胞、中性粒细胞会在现场聚集，对抗入侵者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/University-of-Louisville-scientists-aim-to-disarm-Yersinia-pestis-the-bubonic-plague-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/University-of-Louisville-scientists-aim-to-disarm-Yersinia-pestis-the-bubonic-plague-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=203daa88-6992-4c54-b36c-3fc63dbdf557 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:58:54 -0500 University of Louisville scientists aim to disarm Yersinia pestis, the bubonic plague bacteria
加州大学戴维斯分校健康中心制定了实现医疗保健劳动力多元化的路线图医疗保健系统如何提高劳动力的多样性和包容性？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/UC-Davis-Health-develops-a-road-map-to-diversify-the-health-care-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/UC-Davis-Health-develops-a-road-map-to-diversify-the-health-care-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7106992b-70ad-490a-9cca-8be617a31e0a Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:36:45 -0500 UC Davis Health develops a road map to diversify the health care workforce
使用 FES PET 对乳腺癌患者雌激素受体进行成像的新指南核医学和分子成像协会 (SNMMI) 和欧洲核医学协会 (EANM) 发布了使用 FES PET 对乳腺癌患者进行雌激素受体成像的新程序标准/实践指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-guidelines-for-imaging-estrogen-receptor-in-breast-cancer-患者-using-FES-PET.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/New-guidelines-for-imaging-estrogen-receptor-in-breast-cancer-患者-using-FES-PET.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79437f96-9992-4544-aa77-3485a1ad12e5 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 23:28:15 -0500 New guidelines for imaging estrogen receptor in breast cancer patients using FES PET
研究人员确定了癌症免疫疗法导致胃肠道问题的机制密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种通过基于免疫的癌症治疗导致严重胃肠道问题的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Researchers-identify-mechanism-that-c​​auses-胃肠道问题-with-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Researchers-identify-mechanism-that-c​​auses-胃肠道问题-with-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bb955b1-4b93-4c7d-b977-53db4ca16cbc Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:59:02 -0500 Researchers identify mechanism that causes gastrointestinal problems with cancer immunotherapy
由预测驱动的精准手术：通过最佳风险评分优化患者护理宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。风险预测模型是当前心脏手术实践中评估手术死亡率和术后并发症发生率的重要组成部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Precision-surgery-powered-by-prediction-Optimizing-病人-护理-with-the-best-risk-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Precision-surgery-powered-by-prediction-Optimizing-病人-care-with-the-best-risk-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fb2200a-ec5d-4a2b-a317-184dd863416c Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:32:37 -0500
冷冻消融引起阵发性心房颤动患者全身代谢变化宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。冷冻消融（CRYO）是一种治疗心房颤动（AF）的新型导管消融技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Cryoablation-induces-systemic-metabolic-changes-in-病人-with-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Cryoablation-induces-systemic-metabolic-changes-in-病人-with-paroxysmal-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01eeb987-4ee5-44f8-bb64-610c199a866f Fri, 05 Jan 2024 22:08:26 -0500 Cryoablation induces systemic metabolic changes in patients with paroxysmal atrial fibrillation
早发性心力衰竭显着增加全因死亡的风险宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。本研究旨在调查心力衰竭发病年龄与全因死亡率之间的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Early-onset-heart-failure-significantly-elevates-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Early-onset-heart-failure-significantly-elevates-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e1f7c13-bc3c-440f-ab2d-813eea496fe8 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 21:56:00 -0500 Early-onset heart failure significantly elevates the risk of all-cause mortality
用于早期肺癌检测的吸入式护理点尿液诊断平台使用麻省理工学院开发的一项新技术，诊断肺癌可能变得像吸入纳米颗粒传感器然后进行尿液测试一样简单，以揭示是否存在肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Inhalable-point-of-care-urinary-diagnostic-platform-for-early-lung-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Inhalable-point-of-care-urinary-diagnostic-platform-for-early-lung-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63d9b850-5357-4832-9d9a-d8247b388a8b Fri, 05 Jan 2024 21:02:05 -0500 Inhalable point-of-care urinary diagnostic platform for early lung cancer detection
偏头痛症状与视网膜血流变化有关最近的一项研究发现，视网膜血流的变化可以解释为什么一些偏头痛患者会出现视觉症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Migraine-symptoms-linked-to-retinal-blood-flow-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Migraine-symptoms-linked-to-retinal-blood-flow-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fdbaf98-9942-4e51-ba67-a630f6039243 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 19:33:00 -0500 Migraine symptoms linked to retinal blood flow changes
果蝇研究解决了人类疾病并推动了新的癌症免疫治疗方法在案件悬而未决近25年后，科学家们解开了一个细胞谋杀之谜。从果蝇到小鼠再到人类的一系列证据表明，同类相食的细胞可能会导致罕见的人类免疫缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Fruit-fly-research-solves- human-disease-and-fuels-new-cancer-immunotherapy-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240105/Fruit-fly-research-solves- human-disease-and-fuels-new-cancer-immunotherapy-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d90b670-6399-4970-9853-683bdb8d29f4 Fri, 05 Jan 2024 19:20:00 -0500 Fruit fly research solves human disease and fuels new cancer immunotherapy approach
